Paste:
Paste text.
Note: Web Editor has it's own
clipboard.
Parse: Change unsafe characters  to HTML safe sequences.
Color Picker:
Opens a hexadecimal color picker.
Copy the hexadecimal to your code.
Run: Load file in a web browser.
UnParse:
Change HTML safe sequences into unsafe sequences.
 Opposite of Parse.
Run From File: Open a selected file in a web browser.
Cut:
Cut selected text.
Note: Web Editor has it's own
clipboard.
Templates: Load prewritten HTML code to save time.
